item.title: Workers are getting very worried about losing their jobs as financial fears rise
item.description: Financial worries have gradually taken over as employees’ biggest concerns since inflation spiked, the job market stalled and the rise of AI threatens...

item.title: Why young crypto bros are also some of FanDuel’s and DraftKings’ best customers
item.description: Sports betting is fueling today’s gambling surge, and young men are the industry’s bullseye.

item.title: Wall Street’s ‘fear gauge’ shows investors feeling confident heading into 2026 — and overlooking some big risks
item.description: The VIX has been on a wild ride this year, but it is on track to finish 2025 at or around its lowest level since December 2024.

item.title: How to start a solo 401(k) for your side hustle — and boost your savings up to the $70,000 limit
item.description: If you’re a high earner, you could convert after-tax income into a Roth account and never pay tax on it again.

item.title: Many Americans are struggling to afford food. Ask yourself: Who’s getting rich from this?
item.description: Powerful “Big Ag” — not small farmers and ranchers or even tariffs — is the root cause of the food-affordability crisis.
